Product Description

COLOR
Multi Color White Blue Colorful White Red

Super Easy to Install

The car interior lights are pre-installed with optical fibers, which can be directly inserted into the gap of the center console, and the operation is simple.

High Quality LED Strip

Our car led lights are bright, waterproof and anti-collision. High-brightness led strip lights, lighting is more uniform. The colors and light effects are brighter.

Music Sync

The control button of the interior car lights can switch between different lighting modes with one key control. The controller has a built-in high-sensitivity microphone, which allows the interior lights to change with the rhythm of your favorite songs.

Car Decoration

With this interior light, you won’t get bored while driving. The lights of the light bar can dance with the music, as if you are in a fairy tale world, surrounded by “rainbow”, and accompany you through the long road.

Decorate Your Room

Our led strip lights are romantic creators, with soft and gorgeous lighting adding mood. Allows you to relax your mind while staying in your room.

For Family and Friends

The colorful lights of the LED strips create an exclusive party space for you, allowing you to have a party with your family and friends at any time. Create colorful life

【2022 Upgraded Version,Super Easy to Install】：The optical fiber of interior car lights has been pre-installed, and it can be directly inserted into the gap of the center console, and the operation is simple. Car led lights with USB plugs, plug and play, save more time. Suitable for RVs, camping cars, trailers, cars, trucks, SUVs, ATVs, boats, golf carts, etc.
【Sensitive Music Sensor】: The interior car lights system is equipped with a sound sensor to synchronize the car led lights with the music beat. The LED light strips will automatically change with the rhythm of music or sound to enhance your driving pleasure.
【Multiple Modes & 16 Million Colors】: Our car led lights has 3 light flashing modes, rhythm mode, cycle mode and fixed color mode, which can be switched by pressing the remote control button. There are 16 million colors in the luminous car interior lights, and you can adjust the color you like according to your mood or activity.
【2-wire Concealed Design & Safety 】: This led lights for car adopts a convenient, flexible and unique two-in-one design, which makes it easier to hide the thread in the gap, without worrying about exposed wiring or untidy appearance.The interior car lights is DC5v, built-in fuse, with short circuit protection and memory function. It has good waterproof performance and extremely low heat.
【Perfect Gift and Customer Service】: This Led Car Interior Lights are colorful gifts for your friends and familly in holiday season, especially in christams. Theses strip lights are fun accessories for women, men and teens.Our professional customer service team is on call at any time to provide excellent, lightning-fast response to each of your questions.








5 IN 1 Led Car Strip Light
White Diamond Steering Wheel Cover
Blue Diamond Steering Wheel Covers
Colorful Diamond Steering Wheel Covers

Warranty & Support

If you’d like a copy of the manufacturer’s warranty for a product found on Amazon.com, you can contact the manufacturer directly or visit their website for more information. Manufacturer’s warranties may not apply in all cases, depending on factors like the use of the product, where the product was purchased, or who you purchased the product from. Please review the warranty carefully, and contact the manufacturer if you have any questions.

Price: $44.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:33:29 UTC – Details)


Cheer on your little sports star with the Smart Shots Sports Center by VTech. This electronic sports center features a soccer net and basketball hoop for a fun 2-in-1 play experience. Toss the basketball into the hoop and watch as the LED screen counts the number of baskets. Kick the soccer ball into the net, and the sports center will respond with encouraging sounds and phrases. In addition to counting baskets, The LED screen also encourages play with fun animations. Build fine motor skills with a variety of manipulative features. Turn the gears to hear playful sounds and press the shape buttons to learn shapes, numbers and hear fun sounds. Score, learn and win with the Smart Shots Sports Center!
2-In-1 kids basketball hoop sports center; play on the toddler basketball goal or score goals with the toddler soccer net
Animated light up LED scoreboard counts baskets up to 10 and plays encouraging animations, sounds and phrases; purple side lever restarts the scoreboard count
Shape buttons introduce shapes, numbers and sounds; early learning center comes with 50+ songs, sounds and phrases
Sports toy includes a basketball for shooting hoops and a soccer ball for kicking; toddler basketball hoop develops motor skills
Educational toy meant for toddlers between 1 and 3 years old; operates on 3 AA batteries (not included). Product dimensions 24″ Height, 23″ Wide, 14″ Depth

Read more

Key Features
  • Animated LED scoreboard and encourages play with fun animations
  • Scoreboard counts baskets and plays encouraging sounds and phrases
  • More than 50 songs, melodies, sounds and phrases

Let the games begin! Toss the basketball into the hoop to score points, or kick the soccer ball into the net to hear fun sounds. The scoreboard counts the baskets, promoting cause and effect and introducing numbers. Press buttons, turn gears and flip pages to learn about shapes, numbers and more. Everyone’s a winner with the Smart Shots Sports Center.

Read more

Features

Have a Ball

Tossing and kicking the ball builds motor skills.

Discovery & Exploration

Animations and sound effects attract your baby’s attention and enhance curiosity.

Sounds & Shapes

Turn the gears or press the shape buttons to introduce chapes, numbers, and playful sounds.

Two Ways to Play

Shoot a basket or score a goal with the included basketball and soccer ball.

Read more





VTech Smart Shots Sports Center
VTech Pop-a-Balls – Push and Pop Bulldozer
VTech Sit-to-Stand Ultimate Alphabet Train
VTech Drop and Go Dump Truck
VTech Drill and Learn Toolbox
VTech 2-in-1 Learn and Zoom Motorbike – Pink
Item Model Number 80-156300 80-506000 80-181900 80-166500 80-178200 80-181750
Age Range 12-36 Months 12-36 Months 12-36 Months 6-36 Months 2-5 Years 12-36 Months
Product Description Toss the basketball into the hoop to score points, or kick the soccer ball into the net to hear fun sounds. Drop the colorful balls in the bulldozer and watch as they pop up through the smoke stack, into the scoop bucket and back again. Play ten activities while learning letters, numbers, colors and more. Drop a colorful rock into the top of this cute dump truck and watch it tumble into the bucket to learn numbers. Open the toolbox and get ready for role-play fun with the included drill, hammer, wrench, nails and screws. This 2-in-1 bike has handle bars that move like a real bike and easily transforms from a tricycle for unsteady toddlers into a two-wheel bike.

4.5

(as of Nov 30,2022 04:33:29 UTC – Details)

Our life is full of things from chocolate to cereal, football to flowers and they all have logos. But could you name them if you saw them? Logo is the game that puts your consumer knowledge to the test! Tap into the knowledge you’ve piled up over the years and discover astonishing facts and surprises that will entertain the entire family!.
Number Of Players: 3-100
Country Of Origin : United States
Package Weight : 4.2 Lbs
Product Type : Toys And Games

LCR Left Center Right Dice Game – Blue Tin

LCR Left Center Right is a fun, fast-paced dice game that you won’t be able to put down! Each game includes 3 specialty marked LCR dice, 24 playing chips and instructions. Players roll the dice to determine where they pass their chips. The last player with chips is the winner and wins the center pot.

Product Dimensions: 3″ x 5.5″ x 1″.
